His cactus-inspired hairdo won the barber contest.
Getting a hairdo at that salon takes longer than flying to Paris.
Her hairdo appointment conflicted with the hotpot reservation.
She got a hairdo that makes her look like a pandas emoji.
That retro hairdo from Nirvana's era is trending again.
The hairdresser near my college charges 5 yuan for student haircuts.
My hairdresser always asks if I want 'the usual' when I walk in.
This celebrity hairdresser invented the 'hotpot bangs' trend.
The hairdresser spent 3 hours creating a peacock feather updo.
The hairdresser's salon plays Chengdu rap while cutting hair.
The massage function in this hairdresser chair costs extra 8 yuan.
The barber's hairdressing skills could turn a hedgehog into a poodle.
Traditional Chinese hairdressing includes ear cleaning services.
K-pop stars spend more on hairdressing than some people's rent.
Japanese hairdressing salons give you 10-page menu just for bangs.
The hairdressing salon near my home plays only Jay Chou's songs.

examples.sentence: She always packs a foldable hairdryer when traveling to avoid hotel's weak airflow models.
The cat ran away at the sound of the hairdryer, thinking it was a dragon.
The celebrity scandal caused a hairdryer effect of media coverage.
The hairless Sphynx cat feels like warm suede to touch.
After laser treatment, his skin became temporarily hairless.

examples.sentence: His receding hairline became a hot topic in the office.
The actress used contouring to fake a perfect hairline.
Light seeped through the hairline crack in the Great Wall.
The iPhone screen shattered into pieces connected by hairlines.
There's only a hairline between authentic and fake sneakers.
The hairline difference in spice levels decides a Sichuan chef's level.

examples.sentence: Chefs wear hairnets to prevent strands from falling into the hotpot.
Her vintage hairnet sparkled like a spiderweb under disco lights.
Food factory workers must wear nylon hairnets.
The delicate nylon hairnet is almost invisible in her blonde hair.
The Tang Dynasty gold hairpin exhibited in the museum is inlaid with pearls.
Her emerald hairpin shone under the palace lanterns like fireflies.
She secured her dance bun with three tortoiseshell hairpins.
The modern hairpin can also be used as a mini screwdriver in emergencies.
Her hairpin accidentally fell into the hotpot during the meal.
The detective found a silver hairpin at the crime scene.
The mountain road has 99 hairpin turns like a giant hairpin.
Cyclists must slow down before approaching the hairpin turn.
Her new hairstyle looks like a panda holding bamboo.
This ancient hairstyle was discovered in a Tang dynasty tomb.
She changed her hairstyle after breaking up, like all heroines in dramas.
The 'mushroom cut' became a hairstyle trend after that idol drama.

examples.sentence: The Tibetan mastiff has an extremely hairy chest that resembles a lion's mane.
After not shaving for three months, his legs became disgustingly hairy.
The hairy surface of peach skin traps pesticides easily.
Scientists discovered a new plant with hairy stems in the Amazon.
That hairy caterpillar on your shoulder is actually venomous!
Ancient hairy mammoths are ancestors of modern elephants.
Forgetting your passport before an international flight is definitely a hairy situation.
